db:sect1.db:simpara: This is a sample site created by the XM plugin for Eclipse. You will need to replace it by your own documents.
If you think this message is in error, please contact the webmaster of this site (address usually is webmaster@domain). Do not contact the author of XM as we could not help you.
XM is a simple and affordable content publishing solution based on XML and XSLT. It was originally developped by Benoît Marchal for the "Working XML" column on IBM developerWorks.
